resources.string: Would you like to remove %s from your contact list? Conversations with this contact will not be removed.
Would you like to block %s from sending you messages?
Would you like to unblock %s and allow them to send you messages?
Would you like to remove %s as a bookmark? Conversations with this bookmark will not be removed.
Using your XMPP account to send in stack traces helps the ongoing development of Conversations.
Could not connect to multiple accounts
Add this missing contact to your contact list?
Do you want to delete all messages in this conversation?\n\nWarning: This will not influence messages stored on other devices or servers.
Are you sure you want to delete this file?\n\nWarning: This will not delete copies of this file that are stored on other devices or servers.
Decryption failed. Maybe you don’t have the proper private key.

Conversations uses OpenKeychain to encrypt and decrypt messages and manage your public keys.

It is licensed under GPLv3+ and available on F-Droid and Google Play.

(Please restart Conversations afterwards.)
Could not encrypt your message because your contact is not announcing their public key.\n\nPlease ask your contact to set up OpenPGP.
Could not encrypt your message because your contacts are not announcing their public keys.\n\nPlease ask them to set up OpenPGP.
Vibrate when a new message arrives
Blink notification light when a new message arrives
The length of time notifications are silenced after detecting activity on one of your other devices.
By sending in stack traces you are helping the development
Let your contacts know when you have received and read their messages
The file you selected is not an image
General I/O error. Maybe you ran out of storage space?
The app you used to select this image did not provide enough permissions to read the file.\n\nUse a different file manager to choose an image.
Are you sure you want to remove your OpenPGP public key from your presence announcement?\nYour contacts will no longer be able to send you OpenPGP encrypted messages.
Deleting your account erases your entire conversation history
This is not a valid XMPP address
Out of memory. Image too big
Do you want to add %s to your address book?
Encrypted message. Please install OpenKeychain to decrypt it.
Are you sure you want to destroy this group chat?\n\nWarning: The group chat will be completely removed on the server.
Are you sure you want to destroy this public channel?\n\nWarning: The channel will be completely removed on the server.
Contact added you to contact list
%s has read up to this point
%s have read up to this point
%1$s +%2$d others have read up to this point
Everyone has read up to this point
Tap avatar to select picture from gallery
Could not save avatar to disk
(Or long press to bring back default)
Your server does not support publicizing avatars
Please request presence updates from your contact first.\n\nThis will be used to determine what chat app your contact is using.
Warning: Sending this without mutual presence updates could cause unexpected problems.\n\nGo to “Contact details” to verify your presence subscriptions.
Allow your contacts to retroactively edit their messages
Notifications will be silenced during quiet hours
Join group chats automatically if the bookmark says so
You are banned from this group chat
This group chat is members only
You have been kicked from this group chat
The group chat was shut down
You are no longer in this group chat
You are not connected. Try again later
Prevents the operating system from killing your connection
Backup files will be stored in %s
The backup files have been stored in %s
Do not forget to enable the account.
No app found to open file
No app found to open link
No app found to view contact
Are you sure you want to clear all other devices from the OMEMO announcement? The next time your devices connect, they will reannounce themselves, but might not receive messages sent meanwhile.
There are no usable keys available for this contact.\nCould not fetch new keys from the server. Maybe there is something wrong with your contact’s server?
There are no usable keys available for this contact.\nMake sure you both have presence subscription.
You are trying to remove %s from a public channel. The only way to do that is to ban that user forever.
Make XMPP addresses visible to anyone
Could not modify group chat options
Use Enter key to send message. You can always use Ctrl+Enter to send message, even if this option is disabled.
Change the emoticons key to an enter key
Let your contacts know when you are writing messages to them
No app found to display location
All certificates must be manually approved
This is not a valid username
Download failed: Could not connect to host
Download failed: Could not write file
The server is not responsible for this domain
Show as Away when the screen is turned off
Show as Busy when device is in silent mode
Show as Busy when device is on vibrate
Show hostname and port settings when setting up an account
Enter the text from the image above
XMPP address does not match certificate
Your device does not support the selection of client certificates!
Tunnel all connections through the Tor network. Requires Orbot
This is not a valid port number
This is not a valid hostname
Grant Conversations access to external storage
Grant Conversations access to the camera

Conversations wants permission to access your contacts to match your XMPP contact list with your contacts to show their full names and avatars.\n\nIt will only read your contacts and match them locally without uploading them to your server.

Quicksy needs access to your contacts’ phone numbers to make suggestions about possible contacts who are already on Quicksy.

We will not store a copy of those phone numbers.\n\nFor more information read our privacy policy.

You will now be asked to grant permission to access your contacts.
Hint: Use ‘Choose file’ instead of ‘Choose picture’ to send individual images uncompressed regardless of this setting.
Your device is employing heavy battery optimizations for Conversations which may lead to delayed notifications or even message loss.\nIt is recommended to disable them.
Your device is employing heavy battery optimizations for Conversations which may lead to delayed notifications or even message loss.\n\nYou will now be asked to disable them.
The selected area is too large
You have already validated this persons fingerprint securely to confirm trust. By selecting “Done” you are just confirming that %s is part of this group chat.
No app found to share URI

Quicksy is a spin off of the popular XMPP client Conversations with automatic contact discovery.

You sign up with your phone number and Quicksy will automatically—based on the phone numbers in your address book—suggest possible contacts to you.

By signing up you agree to our privacy policy.
A guide is set up for account creation on chat.sum7.eu.\nWhen picking chat.sum7.eu as a provider you will be able to communicate with users of other providers by giving them your full XMPP address.
Your full XMPP address will be: %s
Set your availability when editing your status message.
A secure password has been generated
Your device does not support opting out of battery optimization
Lets your contacts know when you use Conversations
Use green background for received messages
This device is no longer in use
Grant permission to use the Internet
Report this XMPP address for spamming.
Regenerate your OMEMO keys. All your contacts will have to verify you again. Only use this as a last resort.
You need to be connected to publish your avatar.

Your operating system is restricting Conversations from accessing the Internet when in background. To receive notifications of new messages you should allow Conversations unrestricted access when “Data saver” is on.\nConversations will still make an effort to save data when possible.
Your device does not support disabling Data saver for Conversations.
You have verified all the OMEMO keys in your posession
The barcode does not contain fingerprints for this conversation.
Use the camera to scan a contact’s barcode
Please wait for keys to be fetched
Trust new devices from non-verified contacts, but prompt manual confirmation of new devices for verified contacts.
Blindly trusted OMEMO keys, meaning they could be someone else or someone could have tapped in.
Clean cache folder (used by camera app)
Clean private storage where files are kept (They can be re-downloaded from the server)
I followed this link from a trusted source
You are about to verify the OMEMO keys of %1$s after clicking a link. This is only secure if you followed this link from a trusted source where only %2$s could have published this link.
Are you sure you want to remove the verification of this device?\nThis device and messages from it will be marked as “Untrusted”.
Automatically delete messages from this device that are older than the configured time frame.
Not fetching messages due to local retention period.
Notify for messages and calls received from strangers.
No app found to open website
Server certificates that contain the validated hostname are considered verified
Certificate does not contain a XMPP address
To keep receiving notifications, even when the screen is turned off, you need to add Conversations to the list of protected apps.
The server certificate is not signed by a known Certificate Authority.
Server could not authenticate as \"%s\". The certificate is only valid for:
Do you want to connect anyway?
The QR code scanner needs access to the camera
Scroll down after sending a message
Conversations is unable to send encrypted messages to %1$s. This may be due to your contact using an outdated server or client that can not handle OMEMO.
Hint: In some cases this can be fixed by adding each other your contact lists.

Are you sure you want to disable OMEMO encryption for this conversation?\nThis will allow your server administrator to read your messages, but it might be the only way to communicate with people using outdated clients.
OMEMO will always be used for one-on-one and private group chats.
OMEMO will be used by default for new conversations.
OMEMO will have to be turned on explicitly for new conversations.
The relative font size used within the app.
Message was not encrypted for this device.
Grant Conversations access to the microphone
Use the Share Location Plugin instead of the built-in map
At ‘Start Conversation’ screen open keyboard and place cursor in search field
Host does not support group chat avatars
Only the owner can change group chat avatar
This group chat has been destroyed
This notification category is used to display a permanent notification indicating that Conversations is running.
This notification category is used to display a notification in case there is a problem connecting to an account.
This notification group is used to display notifications that should not trigger any sound. For example when being active on another device (Grace Period).
File omitted due to security violation.
You are already drafting a message.
Quicksy will send an SMS message (carrier charges may apply) to verify your phone number. Enter your country code and phone number:

We will be verifying the phone number

%s

Is this OK, or would you like to edit the number?
%s is not a valid phone number.
We have sent you an SMS to %s.
We have sent you another SMS with a 6 digit code.
Please enter the 6 digit pin below.
Automatically pasted possible pin from clipboard.
Are you sure you want to abort the registration procedure?
The pin you have entered is incorrect.
The pin we have sent you has expired.
Something went wrong processing your request.
You are using an out of date version of this app.
This phone number is currently logged in with another device.
Please enter your name to let people, who don’t have you in their address books, know who you are.
Use the edit button to set your name.
This channel will make your XMPP address public
Enter your password for the account %s to restore the backup.
Do not use the restore backup feature in an attempt to clone (run simultaneously) an installation. Restoring a backup is only meant for migrations or in case you’ve lost the original device.
Could not decrypt backup. Is the password correct?
Please provide a name for the channel
This is an XMPP address. Please provide a name.
Allow anyone to edit the topic
XMPP addresses are visible to admins.
XMPP addresses are visible to anyone.
This public channel has no participants. Invite your contacts or use the share button to distribute its XMPP address.
This private group chat has no participants.

Channel discovery uses a third party service called search.jabber.network.

Using this feature will transmit your IP address and search terms to that service. See their Privacy Policy for more information.
This looks like a domain address
This looks like a channel address
The file you selected is not a Conversations backup file
This account has already been setup
Please enter the password for this account
The sharing app did not grant permission to access this file.
Most users should choose ‘jabber.network’ for better suggestions from the entirety of the public XMPP ecosystem.
You can only have one call at a time.
Add contact, create or join group chat, or discover channels

plurals.item: A message could not be delivered
Some messages could not be delivered
